content:
Sure! Here's the template for step 7:

Subject Line: Request for a Dedicated OutSystems Demo Session

Body:

Dear [Recipient Name],

I hope you are doing well! Thank you for taking the time to engage with us throughout this email series. I'm confident that you now have a better understanding of how OutSystems can help organizations improve their development processes and save time and resources.

As a token of appreciation, I'd like to offer you a dedicated and personalized demo session. During this session, you'll get a chance to see OutSystems in action and understand how it can help you achieve your organization's goals. Our team of experts will answer any questions you might have and provide you with tailored advice based on your specific needs.

Would you be available for a demo session next week? Please let me know and I'll arrange the details.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

Timing: This email can be sent after the recipient has received the first 6 emails and has shown an interest in OutSystems. It can be sent a week after the last email in the series.
